definitions: a system for detecting the presence, direction, distance, and speed of aircraft, ships, and other objects, by sending out pulses of high-frequency electromagnetic waves that are reflected off the object back to the source.
shortDefinitions: system for detecting presence, direction, distance, and speed of objects

definitions: used to indicate that someone or something has or has not come to the attention of a person or group

examples.text: the band has been kind of off the radar these past few years

shortDefinitions: used to indicate that person or thing has or has not come to attention of person or group
